surface

Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ardor3d.scenegraph.Spatial
      • com.ardor3d.scenegraph.Node
        • surface.Platform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ardor3d.scenegraph.hint.Hintable, com.ardor3d.util.export.Savable

    public class Platform
extends com.ardor3d.scenegraph.Node
implements file.Savable
    A class which will handle all movements of any surface.
